revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The influence of metallic tractors on the human body : in removing various painful inflammatory diseases, ... Lately discovered by Dr. Perkins, of North America; and..."
revision.text: Possibly: The influence of metallic tractors on the human body : in removing various painful inflammatory diseases, ... Lately discovered by Dr. Perkins, of North America; and demonstrated in a series of experiments and observations, ... By which the importance of the discovery is fully ascertained, and a new field of enquiry opened in the modern science of galvanism, ... By Benjamin Douglas Perkins. (London printed for J. Johnson; and Oglivy and Son 1799). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/836718722
